data.title: [ci skip]Add opacity/color cascade test case for Scale9Sprite
Fix typos
data.body: Fixes some minor typos.

data.title: Fix Enable_Bitcode compile error under xCode 7
Fixed AudioPlayer crash in Win32
data.body:
Environment: Win32

Because cocos2d::experimental::AudioPlayer copy constructor doesn't initialize _readForRemove property, _readForRemove value is not false. So AudioEngineImpl::update() erases this AudioPlayer immediate during the audio is playing. So that makes crash at the AudioPlayer::rotateBufferThread().

â€» AudioPlayer is inserted into AudioEngineImpl::_audioPlayers by the copy constructor at AudioEngineImple::play2d().

data.title: Fix simulator android x86 release compilation issue
Sprite3D with light will become black on IOS9 Device, not on simulator, not on IOS8
data.body:
It's OK, when not use light on sprite3d object , but use any light in scene will make the sprite3d black on ios9 device.
That's must be a light bug,

data.title: Fixes: SocketIO - Connect failed after Disconnected
data.body: Fixes for the issue: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/14077

data.title: SocketIO - Connect failed after Disconnected
data.body:
Setup:
- Platform: Android
- Framework: 3.8 (JS) (with SocketIO patch for incorrect packet format)
- Create a button to Connect to any working SocektIO (v1+) server
- Create on SocketIO's connect and disconnect event handlers

Test Flow:
- Connect to server
- You should receive connect event
- Disable your Wifi/Mobile Data
- You should receive disconnect event
- Now, enable your Wifi/Mobile Data
- Try to connect again
- No event fire

data.title: Move viewport settings to CCCamera class
data.body: Moving the viewport settings to the camera allows for 2UP (VR) and 4UP (4 Player mode) rendering and helps with mixing 3D and 2D objects.

data.title: Node::getName() now returns string by reference
data.body: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/13983

data.title: A few Label improvements
data.body:
I wasn't sure if I was suppose to create 3 different pull requests, but I worked on the same branch so this was easier.

Anyway,
- the scale factor change is a bug fix
- the size type change to float is useful for small resolutions
- line spacing is a feature I needed, so I added it

data.title: Fix -Wformat-security warning on Xcode
data.body:
This fixes `-Wformat-security` warning like:

```
CCGLViewImpl-desktop.cpp:618:16: Format string is not a string literal (potentially insecure)
```

            if math.ceil(input.a) ~= input.a or input.a >= 1 then

data.title: CMake does not check for sqlite3 dependency
data.body:
It seems that it's possible to run CMake and generate a solution without having the sqlite dependency (libsqlite3-dev on Linux) installed.  This results in the code not being able to compile because it's missing the appropriate include headers.

tested version hash: b38eec4d470d3ed7cf3062c4cad5f821ebc352d5
OS: Linux

data.title: IOS and Android FileUtils
data.body:
Hi,

I am using latest (3.8.1) cocos2dx build. Written my game in Javascript. When i am calling jsb.fileUtils.isFileExist(DIRECTORY_PATH) returns TRUE on iOS and FALSE on Android. jsb.fileUtils.isDirectoryExist(DIRECTORY_PATH) returns FALSE on iOS and TRUE on Android.....
